name: Inspection Requirement - Submission of an ESCP(s), Submit written advice that the ESCP controls have been implemented or the date they will be implemented.
Acceptance Criteria - ESCP requirements listed in G38 Cl2.2.2.
Frequency - ≥10 work days prior earthworks, ≥5 work days prior earthworks, each section
Inspection/ Test Type - Submission, Submission & inspection
Verification Ref. (Record, Test Report, HPR, NCR, etc) - HPR, ESCPs, WPR
Verified by - Project Mgr (PM) / Project Eng’r (PE)
Inspection Requirement - Check service locating & marking, and NDD potholing of existing utilities is completed
Acceptance Criteria - Controls to protect utilities during earthworks in place
Inspection Requirement - Setout by marking on the ground the earthworks limits
Verification Ref. (Record, Test Report, HPR, NCR, etc) - Photo of marking in place
Verified by - PM / PE / S / Surveyor
Inspection Requirement - Check topsoil removed & stockpiled correctly
Acceptance Criteria - Strip full depth of topsoil in earthworks areas. Stockpile for use in revegetation.
Verification Ref. (Record, Test Report, HPR, NCR, etc) - Photo
5 - Test pits to verify CBR10 day & PI of subgrade & insitu SMZ
Spec / Doc Ref. - C-0604.00 R1 Table 6 RNB-241, R44/A2.2, R44/L.1
Inspection Requirement - Check CBR & PI samples completed from test pits
Acceptance Criteria - CBR: Subgrade ≥3%, Insitu SMZlower ≥ 15%,
○ SMZ: Max particle dim: 53mm, >50% passing 19mm sieve, >30% passing 2.36mm sieve
Inspection/ Test Type - T117, T109, Inspection / T280(if req’ed), T106
Verification Ref. (Record, Test Report, HPR, NCR, etc) - CBR, PI, max particle, T106 test reports
○ Note: Report P20009-1 (in D&N Geotechnical report C-0604.00) indicates the ex pvmnt material at BH01 has CBR10 day of 40% per T117)
6 - Excavate to design levels and profiles
Spec / Doc Ref. - R44.3.2, R44/A2.2 C-0604.00 R1 Table 6 RNB-241, Pavement Design Approval - STH18 00222 Tbl R44.8
Inspection Requirement - Check excavated to Design Floor Level (DFL). Check CBR & PI tests completed. Present floor for inspection.
Acceptance Criteria - Where at Top of Formation (DSL-330mm), there is ≥300mm existing Sydney Rd pavement, SMZ comprises existing pavement left in-situ, therefore DFL is DSL-330mm.
○ Where no existing pavement, DFL is DSL-630mm (& a 300mm SMZ to be provided).
○ Level tolerance: +10/-40mm (no insitu SMZ), or +0/-20mm (insitu SMZ)
Inspection/ Test Type - Survey, Test & Inspection
Verification Ref. (Record, Test Report, HPR, NCR, etc) - HPR, DFL Level conformance report
Inspection Requirement - Notify Council of proof roll (WP)
Acceptance Criteria - Not exhibit visible deformation, rutting, yielding or show signs of distress / instability
Frequency - ≤1 work day of proof roll
Verification Ref. (Record, Test Report, HPR, NCR, etc) - WPR, proof roll (T198) report
Inspection Requirement - Where unsuitable material indicated by:
– proof roll, excavate unsuitable to the extent directed by the Principal.
○ Notify when unsuitable removed to the extent directed (Hold Point).
○ Replace w/ compacted Earth Fill or (if directed) Foundation treatments
Acceptance Criteria - Min Rel Comp: 98%, Moisture: 60-90% of OMC
Frequency - each section of unsuitable material
Inspection/ Test Type - Inspection, Refer R44/L.1, Refer R44/L.1
Verification Ref. (Record, Test Report, HPR, NCR, etc) - HPR, compaction & MC (if replaced by compactible material) report, Survey reports (before & after)
9 - Site won SMZ material (for placement where no insitu SMZ)
Inspection Requirement - Submit test reports verifying conformity of each site won SMZ material stockpile
Inspection/ Test Type - T117, T109, Inspection / T280(if req’ed), T106
Verification Ref. (Record, Test Report, HPR, NCR, etc) - HPR, CBR, PI, PSD test reports
○ Note: Report P20009-1 (in D&N Geotechnical report C-0604.00) indicates the ex pvmnt material at BH01 has CBR10 day of 40% per T117)
10 - Placed site won SMZ Layer (for placement where no insitu SMZ)
Spec / Doc Ref. - R44.6.1.2 Tbl R44.7, R44.7.5, R44.7.7.1, R44/A5, R44/L.1 C-0604.00 R1 Table 6 RNB-241, Pavement Design Approval - STH18 00222

Inspection Requirement - Notify Council of proof roll (WP). Submit verification of conformity of SMZ, with test reports & survey conf reports. Check level, compaction, appearance, proof roll results conform.
○ Appearance: homogenous & free from segregated stone or excess fines.
○ Proof roll: Not exhibit visible deformation, rutting, yielding or show distress/instability
Frequency - ≤1 work day of proof roll, Prior covering SMZ, Survey & geotech testing refer R44/L.1
Verification Ref. (Record, Test Report, HPR, NCR, etc) - WPR, HPR, Comp & MC test report, proof roll report, survey thickness & level conformance report
11 - Submission – Closed ITP w/ material & test reports, survey records
Inspection Requirement - Submit closed ITP to Council.
Acceptance Criteria - Complete submission to Council
Verification Ref. (Record, Test Report, HPR, NCR, etc) - This closed ITP & associated records
The lot verification records are complete and attached with all non-conformances and RFI’s closed out.
